product_name: Rossignol X Tour Venture JR AR Cross-Country Skis - Juniors'
long_description: The Rossignol X-Tour Venture JR AR cross-country skis let your little ones explore the slopes by your side. Wood cores with air channels create a skier-friendly flex and keep the skis light and maneuverable. Cap construction creates a ski with good flexibility for maximum contact with the snow; multidirectional fiberglass adds torsional strength and directional stability. AR Plus waxless kick zones feature patterns that are cut into the bases for a good balance of grip and glide.
short_description: The Rossignol X-Tour Venture JR AR cross-country skis let your little ones explore the slopes by your side.
